channel.title: Final Site
channel.description:
[size=4]Ok guys, I've completed the main layout of my client's site. Please go check it out and tell me what you think of it overall. And what you guys think of the loading speed.[/size]
[url=http://www.mparent.be][size=4]www.mparent.be[/size][/url]
[size=4]I know this is another topic but the first one was getting to messy. Hope you don't mind.[/size]
[size=4]Thanks to everyone who helps me out.[/size]

item.title: Final Site
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

Yikes! Just threw up a little in my mouth.

I am a bit confused as to why I need to know the temperature outside when I’m renting a trailer.

Read full topic

[quote=“Jc22493, post:61, topic:394048”]Mista, don’t take the criticisms to the head. The truth is that it’s not that great, so maybe you should improve on it. I’d say remove all the useless parts and start clean. That way, it won’t look so ‘cluttery’ thus achieving a more professional look.[/quote]Thanks for the advice, I’ll work on it when I have time.

item.title: Final Site
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Mista, don’t take the criticisms to the head. The truth is that it’s not that great, so maybe you should improve on it. I’d say remove all the useless parts and start clean. That way, it won’t look so ‘cluttery’ thus achieving a more professional look.

item.title: Final Site
item.dc:creator: @cedaw cedaw
item.description:
@cedaw wrote:

[quote=“MistaBigBoss, post:51, topic:394048”]Cedaw, you’re lower than anyone can actully get. Noone gives a fuck about you or your comments and opinion. Atleast I know multiple languages unlike you. Tell me, who are you, what do you do with your life? Because for a low life and low educated runescape freak you are giving a LOT of critism. So please, tell me, who are you?

I know it’s piece and not “peace” but when shitheads like you start to annoy me, I get angry and start misspelling. Again, what do you do besides playing runescape?

The only way that you can get back to me is by highlighting my spelling.[/quote]

you’re spot on! I do nothing but sit here, eat ice cream, and play RuneScape everyday and all day. please teach me your investigative techniques so that way when I grow up I can be just like you, MistaBigBoss.

item.title: Final Site
item.dc:creator: @cedaw cedaw
item.description:
@cedaw wrote:

[quote=“MistaBigBoss, post:27, topic:394048”]@cedaw Shitfuck, I know the difference about you’re and your, your is used when referring to something that belongs to someone. And you’re is short for you are. Now I don’t know why I made that mistake but we are humans.

Unlike you, I learned my english from the internet, I speak fluent Armenian, Dutch and English. I speak normal French. And I speak some Russian. So get the fuck out you fucking American peace of RuneScape shit. Go and mine some coals or something.

And, mods, honestly, don’t mute me, I am not insulting people here, if you’RE instuled by ^ then it’s time to kill yourself.

P.S. EVERYTHING YOU SEE IN THE SITE IS REQUESTED, I DID NOT ASK ANY OF THAT, THE OWNER OF THE COMPANY DREW A SKETCH OF THE LAYOUT. THE TRUCK BUTTONS, HE SENT ME THOSE FUCKING TRUCKS OVER FROM SKYPE AND ASKED ME TO USE THEM, HE ONLY HAD THREE, I HAD TO MAKE THE BUS IN FUCKING PAINT.[/quote]

first off, I’d like to say that it’s piece, not peace. second, I’d like to point out the ignorance you possess.

besides, we all know that it’s not the quantity of the languages you know, but the quality you know it (I’m pretty sure the phrase “quality != quantity” appears on this site like crazy).

also, a semi-decent designer would use photoshop. hell, I can’t design for shit but I still at least have photoshop lol…

thank you for making yourself look stupid.

Read full topic

item.title: Final Site
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:21, topic:394048”][quote author=IlikeArrays link=topic=491234.msg3593550#msg3593550 date=1304839558]
Get real pictures of the trucks? Or get real pictures of the trucks and photoshop them so they look nice.

Get rid of the calender/clock/counter shit…

and I like it.
[/quote]^ this if I was a customer looking for a truck company I wouldn’t want to see like block trucks lol[/quote]

Well, they are just icons to select your catagory of rental. Obviously it would lead somewhere with more information/pictures when it’s complete.

They are stretched out or something though. It’d look a lot more sharp if they were redone or fixed up.

Read full topic

item.title: Final Site
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

[quote=“Slave Scyth, post:41, topic:394048”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=491234.msg3595701#msg3595701 date=1305058158]
Top right of the screen is horrible; other than that, it’s not too bad.
[/quote]Exactly my opinion.

Having a calendar, etc. isn’t bad with any website so long as you make it work with the rest of the site. What’s going on with the design right now just doesn’t ‘mesh’. The main design is very minimalistic (which, as I said before, is how I like it) while the flashiness of the widgets just rapes it.

I don’t like the bottom Copyright banner either. Try playing with the gradient color (possibly a little darker?) and maybe black or a dark gray for the text? I don’t know, I have trouble visualizing things. Just do something with it. Haha. Maybe make it the same width as the container of everything else.

Is there a reason the top banner and links are in English but the rest is in German?[/quote]It’s Dutch actully, and the reason is Belgian people speak a lot of English and a lot of companies have English names. As to everyone having problems with the top right, it’s because I made the site for a minimum resolution of 1280 x 800. Anything lower than that, and the widgets get fucked up. I will also have a word with the owner tomorrow and tell him about what people think of the website and if he says ok remove the widgets, I’ll remove them.

Read full topic

item.title: Final Site
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:40, topic:394048”]Top right of the screen is horrible; other than that, it’s not too bad.[/quote]Exactly my opinion.

Having a calendar, etc. isn’t bad with any website so long as you make it work with the rest of the site. What’s going on with the design right now just doesn’t ‘mesh’. The main design is very minimalistic (which, as I said before, is how I like it) while the flashiness of the widgets just rapes it.

I don’t like the bottom Copyright banner either. Try playing with the gradient color (possibly a little darker?) and maybe black or a dark gray for the text? I don’t know, I have trouble visualizing things. Just do something with it. Haha. Maybe make it the same width as the container of everything else.

Is there a reason the top banner and links are in English but the rest is in German?

Read full topic
